name: jason jackson
text: The Mellow Mushroom in Avondale is a great place to get some pizza and good food. I really like the use of the former movie theater and open layout of the restaurant. This location has a unique flavor and vibe that is a little different and …More

name: Evan Guthrie
text: The Mellow Mushroom in Avondale is a great place to get some pizza and good food. I really like the use of the former movie theater and open layout of the restaurant. This location has a unique flavor and vibe that is a little different and …More

name: Robert Brown
text: We LOVE Mellow, but today we came right around noon and there's only 1 waitress and our food took around 40 minutes to come out even though there was hardly anyone in there. Next the men's bathroom was FILTHY! How is that possible when …More

name: Karen Weiss
text: For those who haven't visited a different location, try a different one.  There is a pie or drink that is unique to each site.  All the favorites are on the menu with a local surprise.

name: Nate Emmett
text: The mushroom soup was only alright but the pizza was really good.

name: London Vite
text: Loved this place. Excellent gluten free pizza and the salads are delicious.  Funky atmosphere, friendly  service.  Bar area with multiple tv screens to watch sports  and enjoy a drink. Lots of comfortable seating.

name: Michelle Sullivan
text:
They've done a great job re-opening during the COVID pandemic. One of the few places I feel comfortable going out to eat at.
And of course the food is awesome!

name: Joe Dennig
text: Loved this place until yesterday. Went after church with kids at opening time. Floors were dirty, bathrooms dirty, salad came out with brown lettuce and cores, and the sandwich was cold, soggy and tasteless. The server said manager wasn't …More

name: Henry Navarrete
text: It's was legit pizza tasted fresh I'm so down to coming back super great experience.

name: Amelia Little Bear
text: I am a forgiving person but three times now our meal has been really bad. I am from Atlanta and I literally grew up with the Shroom. My love for this pizza place is boundless , but yo something isn't ok with this kitchen/management. Unhappy !

name: Mike Damico
text: The Sausage calzone was good and priced pretty well. Only thing I didn’t like was the “pretzel bites”. It was my bad I didn’t pay more attention to the picture, but the pretzel bites are actually garlic knots. They are balled up dough, …More

name: Kaylyn Millington
text: The pizza is so good and they have some really awesome topping combinations. The building itself is decorated really amazing and they always project a movie on the wall. which is very fun. One of my favorite pizza places

name: Patricia Wurthmann
text: Always good food and great company.

name: Melissa Schacher
text: This wasn't my favorite experience at a Mellow Mushroom. The pizza was done very quickly which was wonderful as we were extremely hungry; but the middle was a little soggy and the toppings weren't evenly distributed on both sides of the …More

name: David Vath
text: Pepperoni and mushroom pizza, where have you been all my life?

name: Trista Zimbauer
text: Extremely disappointed in the last 2 orders of vegan pizzas. First time, we specifically asked them for vegan cheese and got regular cheese which was disappointing. Second time we've ordered (different day) we asked for BBQ tempeh but …More

name: Kaylen Cheater
text: When you order bleu cheese just know it’s actually a dressing not cheese. Be sure to check the under side of your pizza for things that you didn’t order and could be allergic to. Also our waitress was very rude and basically did all but push us out the door to clear tables even though the restaurant was empty.

name: Enrique H.
text: A little slow but great customer service!! Their local pizza options are good too!

name: Mike Hancho
text: Mellow Mushroom is great. This location measured up to the rest. Friendly service and good pizza. Cool beer selection. The projection TV showing movies is fun for kiddos and the multiple NFL games on the TVs afforded options on a Sunday to hang out and relax while still watching the games.

name: Sompob Prasertkun
text: The only place that close after 10pm (kitchen close 11pm) we almost had nothing to eat for dinner. Luckily you were open. Chicken wing was soooooo amazing. We almost cry (with Thai chili sauce). The service was superb. Thank again.

name: Adam Powell
text: I first visited Mellow Mushroom on King St but unfortunately that location closed down due to the Covid pandemic and the rent being raised on the owner. However, this location is only about 11 minutes from downtown Charleston and was a great atmosphere.

name: Jamie Downs
text: Surprisingly good veggie/vegan options

name: Rhett Michael
text: Used to work here. Saw my GM Jackson give the go ahead to send out pretzels that fell on the floor to the customer because it wasn't time efficient to remake. Enjoy your floor pretzels. Wow...

name: Alonzo W.
text: Great staff good food and good beer selection

name: Jen Jen T
text: Was not impressed. Ordered take out from the Magnolia (WA) Charleston location. Not worth the money ($37) spent. The regular crust is just as thin as the thin crust.  Ordered the Funky Q Chicken and barbecue wings. Wings were rubbery with …More

name: Dance of the Differently Abled
text: I placed an order on their website to pick up around 8:45 on Tuesday evening. I got a call at 8:30 telling me that they ran out of tofu. I was told they could cancel and refund the order or make it without the tofu. I asked for it to be …More

name: Abid Alam
text: Friendly staff. Always update correctly about pick up times.

name: Adrian
text: Great ambiance, cool vibes, and very good pizza. Their crust is unique, not traditional but very tasty. The ingredients they use are always high quality. Now they have tables outside too!

name: Charles
text:
told the wait staff more than four times, no bacon !

never refilled the tea or water glasses. THEY WERE NOT BUSY!! …More

name: Darryl D. King Jr.
text: Food is always great.  Love pizzas and calzones.  Wife likes the gluten free pizzas, though this is a premium for them and they only come as small pizzas.  Avoid the wings.  Nice beer and cider selection.  Awesome building, decent service.  Good spot for pizza, heart of Avondale.

name: Carolyn Seitz
text: My daughters and I are vegan. It is hard to find a really good vegan pizza. The pizza here is delicious! My daughters loved it. They thought the vegan cheese was fabulous. We definitely want to go back.

name: Lucas Doudna
text: I didn't order any food but I had a tasty adult beverage called the Golden Monkey. I could see kids and parents both enjoying this place a lot. I studied the menu and the pizzas sounded very tasty. The highlight was the giant movie screen …More

name: Justin W
text: Mellow mushroom is always a go to for us. They always have a great selection of beer on tap and their pizza is consistently good! I will definitely be back. Plus they just put up a nice outdoor seating area in the front that looks like a …More

name: sophia Rindge
text: Walked in here a few nights ago and the food was very good. When I went to the ladies room with my little sister I was startled to see the brunette hostess who sat us vaping in the restroom. She didn't seem to care to stop after we had walked in. She smelled of weed and it has really ruined my opinion of this place.

name: Timothy Laufer
text: Good food and kind service. Seemed like they were short staffed when we went; the servers were running all over the place. They did a great job though.

name: Liz Danielle
text: Came by this past weekend for lunch with my mother in law. The entire restaurant was completely empty but it was super dirty and the staff was kind of rude and unwelcoming. Food was less than mediocre. We will not be returning.

name: Justin H
text: Ordered a GF pizza and it was the worst ever. Sauce and toppings dumped in the center.

name: Flora Ingram
text: Holy Shitake ! That pizza was good!

name: Brianna Moger
text: Very cool atmosphere. Loved that there were vegan and vegetarian options. Food was delicious. However, the reason I didn't give it 5 stars was the server. Very nice, but she didn't know the menu very well (for example, I asked about …More

name: Frederick Graham
text: Awesome pizza and quick service

name: Katherine Fox
text: Awful service, had to tell our waiter to get refills on drinks and for check and box. Had to wait on him for 15 minutes. Will not be going back.

name: Rachel M
text: Such a cool building (it’s in a renovated old theater) and it was cool that there were a lot of movies being played. Service was subpar however. Took forever to get our drinks as well as our appetizer and pizzas (pretty sure the server …More

name: Shawn Haught
text: The pizza was really good. I actually like the taste of the crust.

name: Joshua Pegram
text: Good pizza. Ok service.

name: C Matthews
text: Gave it a few tries. Bring back King Street please!

name: Tom Cagle
text: Good pizza, subs and salads.  Gluten Free options available.

name: Lane Doss
text: Was told 25 min for my carry out order. Took 15 min longer. Staff doing carry out wasn't very friendly.

name: Miss Boujie
text: Queso and chips. Salsa is hot. I love the heat

name: Andy Barney
text: Great pizza.

name: Barbara Drake
text: Great service and food

name: William Anderson
text: Excellent food and the building is an old theater that I went to see movies at when I was a teenager.

name: Troy Perkins
text: Always good! Great pies, better service, awesome staff!!!

name: Michael Miller
text: I tried calling since 8:15 tonight with no answer. I finally got hold of an employee at 8:43 and asked if they would deliver an order to the hospital for the nurses and was told no. She said it was too late. So sad..... I will not support mellow mushroom from this point on.

name: Shannon Spitser
text: Food good so was service

name: Ava B
text: There is some amazing lighting upstairs if you face the window at a certain angle

name: Michele Drake
text: This Mellow had the best service I've ever had at a Mellow.  Great job!

name: Grant Hadley
text: Celiac-friendly pizza joint. They do a great job about cross contamination with their gluten-free pizza. Delicious! A little expensive, but worth it for the quality

name: Nancy St
text: This location does not disappoint ...extensive menu, great food and service, eclectic decor, great value (ask for mystery beer). They used to host mid day movie time for kids in the summer... …More

name: Evalyn Wallingford
text: Good was great but had a slow server.  Restaurant can be on the loud side.

name: Sandy Billingsley
text: I love MM.  I got a lunch special with a slice and a beautiful Greek salad (delish) with sweet tea for $7.99. I always enjoy it and the only reason I gave 4 stars today was because my service was slack.  She took my order and brought my …More

name: A C
text: Very nice restaurant and the food was yummy!

name: James Myers
text: Absolutely unacceptable.  I arrived a little before 12:30 with two of my children for lunch.  I ordered a SALAD and a small pizza...one hour later it came to the table.  It was so late that we couldn't even eat, as I had to get them home …More

name: Nick Beaty
text: I ordered Uber Eats from this Mellow Mushroom. When the driver arrived he notified me that he had been given the wrong order by accident. No worries, as a worker in the customer service industry, I know these things happen. No one …More

name: Leon Blue
text: I didn't know that they stayed open until 2am!!!...BEST MELLOW MUSHROOM that I've ever been in... …More

name: Ryan
text: Food was excellent.  I actually ate the pizza crust.  Keep up the good work guys.

name: Jennifer Butler
text: Adorable and funky pizza place and bar.

name: Aaron Newman
text: Good food, cool things to look at.

name: Joseph Lucas
text: I came in late for dinner after work tired and hungry. They didn't seemed annoyed with me and where very polite and kind. Thank you.

name: Naomi Bradford
text: Great food, slow service.

name: Christopher Mitchum
text: The bartender, Andrew and the manager were really cool and made sure that service was top notch

name: Drew Glenn
text: Lol. Don't play football on Sundays if you're not prepared for people to cheer for their team. We were never vulgar or disrespectful. As a loyal & paying customer, I don't understand how cheering for my team could be considered so …More

name: Steve Malone
text: Service was great but beer not very cold and wings were very small.

name: Steven Ervin
text: If you aren't going to serve Pepsi products at least serve Mellow Yellow. They were out of numerous menu items. I would of asked for the check before the food, but my buddy pleaded for us to stay. Would be a one star, but the service despite it all was good.

name: Thomas Gigliotti
text: Ordered a calzone and it was excellent!  Staff was really attentive, location was clean and order came out hot and fresh.  This was my first visit to this location and I was impressed!

name: Shannon Nicholl
text: Oddly disappointing with strips of bacon and a thick layer of cheese. My hearts broken.

name: L S
text: Literally the WORST SERVICE I HAVE EVRR HAD AT ANY RESTAURANT. THE ENTIRE SNOTTY RICH KID STAFF WAS STANDING AROUND AT BAR AND NO PLATES, DRINKS BUT A WHOLE LOT OF ATTUTUDE. MANAGER AND STAFF NEEDS FIRED IMMEDIATELY! HORRIBLE

name: Jimmie White
text: If we lived in Charleston it would be where we got our pizza.

name: Christopher Bernard Sojourner
text: Best pizza place in town. Their wings are pretty awesome too. Make sure to check out their happy hour.

name: Jeff Squires
text: I'm a piece of purest meaning that I'm a pepperoni and sausage only guy. But I will say the barbecue chicken pizza there is ridiculously delicious

name: Katykjax
text: 1st time there. Great burger and margarita. The staff is very friendly and efficient.

name: Innocent Flame
text: This place is te greatest piece of art in Charleston.  The Greatest Charlestonian restuarant that exists.

name: Michelle L Snipes
text: The food was good good, service, not so much. Long wait time for appetizers. Never got a drink refill.

name: Geoff Thomas
text: It's a mellow mushroom. You know what you're getting. Decent pizza, good drinks, fair price.  If you haven't had it, try it.  If you've had it before, this place doesn't disappoint.

name: K Wallace
text: We love it. The Cajun wings are awesome. I love the way they have done the inside. There are TV's for sports and a bug TV for a family movie. The pizza is amazing. We will be back.

name: Jessica Litzenberger
text: Service wasn't as stellar as weve gotten at other locations, but the pizza was great as usual!

name: E. Pitman Gallup
text: Parry of 4, at 5:45 PM, seated immediately even though the restaurant was nearly full. Very attentive wait staff, manager and waiter would check with us frequently, but not bother us. Drinks arrived quickly as did our salads. Pizza came in …More

name: Vic Valerio
text: Best Pizza

name: AJ Myrick
text: The attached is friendly and energetic, the food tasty and unique. Great kitchen staff!!

name: Tim Roop
text: Love the Mellow Mushroom. We always have great service and food.

name: Crystal Holder
text: The restaurant is in an old theatre.  I love the design and atmosphere.  Very different feel from other Mellow Mushrooms.  The food is good.  I'm gluten free and they have the best gluten free pizza I've found.  Like any Mellow it is a …More

name: Joyce Schirtzinger
text: The pizza is amazing!!! I want them to come to WV. My husband and I only get it  when we travel . With a name like  Mellow Mushroom it sounded like a place my daughter would like but the pizza is amazing and you can split the pizza , I love that.

name: dELEPHINE dELGADO
text: Italian. It couldn't be any better. Coming back is ever better, though.

name: Tiffany
text: I would not recommend this mellow mushroom. It took 35 minutes for our pizza to come out. It was a large half cheese half pepperoni. 35minutes on a Tuesday evening, not busy at all. Then when I said something the manager comped it 5$. …More

name: Robert Henne
text: Never had a bad visit at any Mellow Mushroom. Always great food and service.

name: Daniel Houghton
text: Food was excellent. Service was a bit slow but overall we enjoyed the experience.

name: Jeffrey Friedman
text:
The mushroom soup was excellent and the pizza just as good.
Very friendly and helpful employees

name: Belen Vitello
text: Delicious! On Wednesday, there is a $5 one topping special for an individual pizza at this location in West Ashley. Cool location, used to be a movie theater. Negative is that it's loud and difficult to talk or hear people talk. They also deliver if your zip is 29407.

name: Ashly Dennis
text: Gluten free pizza is amazing!

name: Donald Overton
text: I'd kill for that potato pizza!  Amazing!  Great beer selection, too, and an overall cool building / vibe.

name: Patrick Knight
text: Best pizza in town. The magic mushroom soup is tasty too. Really it all is. Cookie Sunday anyone?

name: Jennifer Mitchell
text: I absolutely love Mellow Mushroom! This location is also amazing. They have lots of TVs to watch sports on, the bar is great(and lots of sitting room), and there is a nice area upstairs also. The bruchetta is amazing, love the veggie …More

name: Juan Baltazar
text: Delicious pizza and hot wings

name: Candy Barton
text: This is my 4th time giving Mellow Mushroom a chance but it's definitely my last. We had a great gf pizza at the Mt. Pleasant location several years ago but have had bad experiences at West Ashley and Summerville. Today we ate at the WA …More

name: Hermena Goss
text: Very clean and nice

name: Zahrah Hentati
text: Mickey was really cool. He's a great server. His customer service is fantastic! Try to get him as your waiter if you can. …More

name: Emy Loo
text: Always enjoy going to mellow mushroom, the menu has plenty to choose from for any person. Staff can be hit or miss but food is always on point. Great atmosphere in all locations.

name: Trueblessings Herbals
text: The wait is FOREVER even if you call ahead to place an order. The pizzas are definitely worth the wait. I prefer King st location because they're a lot faster and the pizza is still excellent!!

name: Reggie Walters
text: Best mushroom and truffle oil pizza and those Calzones...yum!

name: Doug Snyder CPA
text: Great local fun place

name: Kevin Olivett
text: Absolutely, I sent an email this morning.

name: Gideon Crane
text: Love the vibe if this location, and the food is good too

name: southernman 142
text: Great pizza. Cold beer, big selection.

name: Jeremy Haney
text: Mellow has pretty darn good pizza, and this is a cool spot with great bartenders. Don't tell anyone I told you, but they've got $5 car bombs. Pro tip, try the gluten free pizza. I know, I know...but it's a crispy crust that might just be better than their original.

name: Wesley Phillips
text: Great pizza and good variety of pies

name: Yang March
text: This place is the bomb and their pizza rules. It's quite cheap and the people are zany and nice.. I ve tried almost all their pizza and it was amazing. Moral of the story? Get over your love of McDonalds and stick with these guys. They're legit. THANKS :D

name: John Bosom
text: This place rules! Pizza was delicious and my beer was ice cold! My wife enjoyed it as well

name: Katherine Ham
text: Fun atmosphere (it’s in an old movie theater) and some of my favorite pizza. We got a large pizza that was half Kosmic Karma and half Caesar pizza. We even stumbled on free trivia Tuesday which was really fun

name: Catherine
text: Had the best service today and the food was amazing! Tried the vegan cheese for the first time and was really impressed with the taste and texture (super melty). They can customize a lot of the menu to be vegan and offer gluten-free options as well.

name: Hannah Helander
text: Seriously paid $56 for 1 large Supreme and 1 small chicken bacon ranch pizzas. That’s absolutely ridiculous 😂

name: Marc Daniel
text: Awesome Pizza!!

name: Scott Grigg
text: The mushroom soup at this place is worth the trip alone! I had the soup and the bruschetta and both were outstanding. Their pizzas are also great. If you're looking for an affordable good solid meal with the best mushroom soup you've ever had the Mellow Mushroom is the place to go.

name: Bill Taylor
text: Gluten free was perfect for our granddaughter. Our Great White and Special pizzas were also great. Responsive service, great draft beer choices, and friendly staff.

name: Lucas
text: I come to Charleston SC every year and we always eat here! I've never had any problems with this place. The food is great, staff are very nice! It's also never crowded, EVER! If your in Charleston, you should defiantly eat here. I would also recommend eating here for Lunch not Dinner, just my Preference.

name: Aaron Cohen
text: Awesome place, great for games. Best pizza in town. Great beer selection

name: Heyward McDonald
text: Mellow Mushroom has a fun "game day" atmosphere with lots of big televisions all  over.  It is a large and fun place where the employees are friendly and seem happy to be there.  The pizza is good, but not great and the prices are moderate. …More

name: Janet Deschak
text: This was a less pleasant experience than I am used to at Mellow Mushroom. The atmosphere wasn't very nice - it was dark and cavernous with unattractive decor. The high open ceilings made it very noisy. Plus the hostess took us past many …More

name: Steven Leimberg
text: Great prices. Lots of taps. Good food & friendly atmosphere.

name: Uriel Ali
text: I love ordering from here, my go to for pizza night  and the wings are bomb! My fav part is their service, always first class.

name: Katie Sanders
text: 1st time being there not bad at all.

name: Steven M Gindhart
text: Good lunch special.

name: Gary Celli
text: Interesting atmosphere, friendly staff, decent food with a wide selection of toppings. Really only downside is the pricing on the food seems unfair.

name: Thomas Lindenmuth
text: Best wings around this area for certain. Atmosphere is down to earth and much cleaner compared to some other spots and a deli in the area (not Jason's) they are g2g but don't want to name names!! Pizza is stellar as well!!

name: Julius Buzzard
text: I enjoy Mellow Mushroom anytime I head south. The food was a little undercooked at this location though. In addition, our food took a while to get to us and I'm pretty sure they forgot our order for a while. Overall, I'd still check it out, if you've never been, but don't be too surprised if it takes a while.

name: Miller Miller
text: Very close to my rental property I am fixing up and I had eaten at the one downtown Charleston before so I expected the same type of food and service. Food was okay but service was even worse than on a busy day on Second Sunday. I am not …More

name: Trevor Hill
text: Great food and atmosphere.  Service was a little inattentive unless you could flag them down at the table

name: Richard B
text: Great atmosphere but I'm not a big fan of the pizza there. However my sisters family absolutely loves it. So if you're in Charleston I would recommend it,

name: John Lloyd
text: The waitress was nice enough to let me try the soup before I committed, which I appreciated. When I did get the soup, it turned out to be a very small portion (maybe half a spoon deep). The pretzel bites were just cuts of unsalted sliced …More

name: Catherine Murray
text: The atmosphere is nice and the pizzas are huge! Definitely get your money's worth here.

name: Angie Davis
text: Love the FOOD ❤️

name: Tony Schirtzinger
text: We always love Mellow Mushroom. Wonderfully creative restaurants, good service, and amazing pizza!

name: Jacqueline V
text: Great pizza. Love the pretzels. Good drinks.Convenient location. Fun environment.

name: RichSellsCHS . com - Rich Tavetian, Realtor
text: In an old movie theater this place has it all. The atmosphere is so exciting. Delicious pizza (and so many options), fun staff, and awesome drinks. Go to their trivia night, it's a blast!

name: Mike Christopher
text: Service has been getting slow lately. Good atmosphere for kids. Good pizza.

name: Hoan Le
text: Considerate and patient with our large party

name: Pa Mose
text: Awesome pizza, amazing options, great service.

name: Brad Willey
text: Can honestly say we are never disappointed when we eat at Mellow Mushroom. Food and service are consistently great regardless of location.  A+++

name: Shawn Williams
text: They have awesome food. This last visit they prepared a pizza for me that was no longer on their menu. (PRICEY)

name: Chelsea Mosley
text: My guilty pleasure. Bruisheta is off the chain, plus if you know of a previous menu item that's not on the menu any longer ask they can make it if they have the ingredients

name: Daniel Schram
text: Awesome pizza

name: Linda Metro
text: My first time there. Loved the atmosphere & pizza!

name: Sara Russell
text: Amazing food and service. Great server names McKenzie!

name: Nathan Mims
text: It's really good if you get the right server. Sometimes the pizza comes out soggy, but overall it's our go to spot for pizza

name: Barry Dudeck
text: Great place to spend time with friends, fresh made pizza and sandwiches. The staff is always friendly.

name: Bonnie Grossman
text: Mellow's crust is very good. Wish they did a white pie without a bunch of garlic.

name: Tim Stoe
text: Very good pizza and solid beer selection. The Gourmet White, with an olive oil base and sun-dried tomatoes is one of my favorites and we always go for an order of soft pretzels. The décor/art is modern and the atmosphere is very laid back. …More

name: southstatevideos
text: Great atmosphere.  Down home fun and the food was awsome.. 5 stars isnt enough  i truly enjoyed my visit.......

name: Doug Rogers
text: Never had a bad experience here. I used to go to the one in Asheville, which has a very different atmosphere, the food is right on par and staff has always been friendly.

name: Jetsin87
text: Great Steak & Cheese on Pita!  Service is pretty solid as well. I've always been a fan of the Mellow so I am very candid with my reviews..

name: Travis Braznell
text: Hard to find a better salad.  Add whatever you might wish.  Solid service and drink selection.

name: Patricia Raskauskas
text: WOW! What great decor! Terriffc pizza, meatball sub and hoggies.  Wish I lived here to come once a week.

name: Rhakeem Vanderburg
text: It was trivia night, so it was really packed, but we were seated with not much of a wait. The first server for or section left without checking on us, but another (Lynsey) saw us waiting and got us a new one. Overall, it was the usual Great MM experience, thanks to the save by Lynsey.

name: Shaunie Drayton
text: Pizza was AWESOME!!!! BEST IVE HAD NICE CRISPY CRUSTY. FRIENDLY ATMOSPHERE. WONDERFUL QUICK SERVICE!!!!

name: Mandy
text: Excellent pies, great atmosphere. Never had a problem being seated quickly, despite the location being pretty populated. But really, the ambience is fabulous.

name: kaylee david
text: This location is my favorite mellow mushroom. I love the aesthetic and the food is always good

name: Constance Allegood
text: Great food and good drinks! This location used to be a movie theater and has been renovated to house the restaurant. That gives it a one of a kind atmosphere that can't be beat!

name: Montez Hazel
text: Great customer service

name: Will LaForge
text: Pizza is delicious but a bit pricey for what your getting.

name: Troy Amadeus
text: One of my favorite pizza franchises

name: Sarah Nia
text: A bit over-priced, the food, particularly their pizza is actually worth the extra few bucks.  Great food, slow service.  Now on ubereats!

name: Nathan Ollis
text: Completely different atmosphere than the others!  Awesome inside...once you get in there.  Prepare for parking hell though, literally.  In that back parking lot, if you try to go down there and there isn't a space...you are backing all the …More

name: Ankit Varma
text: Would've given them five stars if it wasn't for their slow service. Food's good as usual, kitchen staff needs to pace up.

name: Rachele Olszewski
text: Always great atmosphere, service and food!

name: Kristi Hoffmaster
text: Very busy!  But this is my favorite MM in all of South Carolina. Love the atmosphere and the pizza is 100% awesome!

name: Laura Smith
text: Five Dollars Small Pizza Wed!

name: Richard Vaughan
text: Reed was awesome thanks darling and food was good

name: Nate Elkins
text: Great food, and the old theater it's in is awesome!

name: Colleen Paavola
text: Food was really great, our server was helpful and cheery, but it's really loud in there.

name: Thomas Robinson
text: Great staff and service,they get to know there regular customers and take extra care. Good place to chill in the bar area while waiting to meet friends in Avondale …More

name: Pam Paxton
text: Great service and nice to take grandson. He loved his Pizza.

name: Caryn Voyles
text: Food was great.

name: J C
text: Solid, like all Mellows. Good staff too. I'd recommend this location

name: Mike Shahp
text: Fun pizza pace with good drink specials

name: L A
text: This building is amazing. The restaurant sits in what used to be a theater. They kept the theme and it works. Nice location in Avondale. My Bruschetta was delicious. Friendly wait staff.

name: MarleySnob420
text: Screwed up my order. I was told it would be made right on my next visit, I tried to redeem that order tonight and got blown of and denied by manager. Ridiculous

name: Michael Hodge
text: Lunch was great. Wonderful atmosphere. Our server Genesis was attentive, helpful and kind. Will ask for her next time in. Love the addition of ricotta to the calzones.

name: J R
text: I visited Mellow Mushroom for the first time on a vacation to Charleston, and I was wary because I associate pizza places with unhealthy food. Boy was I wrong. The restaurant has calorie values for every entree + sides or additions, and …More

name: Nathan Strutz
text: I visited late on a Friday night and was instantly impressed with the helpfulness of the staff, promptness of the food, and quality of the pizza. Most of all though, I fell in love with the building! It's a brightly decorated theater full of art and TV screens. Very impressive.

name: Marn Taylor
text: Anna provides excellent service at the bar. Always good food.

name: Jana Delli-Gatti
text: Seriously,  Google expects me to remember a place I may have been 2 years ago?

name: Jennifer Hupko
text: I love how every Mellow is unique & this was did not disappoint! Food was good & our server was attentive.

name: ron forster
text: One of the best pizzas around.

text: Fantastic all around.  In a remodeled theater, the noise level can be a bit high when crowded, but it's a lively place with great staff.  Parking is hard on the weekends, but that's not exclusive to this restaurant and there is valet parking available.
